_description: All settings with descriptions and examples
_shared_text_info: Default text shown in the shared text editor
_admin_password_info: Password for admin access. CHANGE THIS IN PRODUCTION!
_port_info: Server port. Use 3000 for development, 80/443 for production
_upload_directory_info: Directory where uploaded files are stored. Can be absolute or relative path
_max_file_size_info: Maximum file upload size. Supports: 1KB, 100MB, 5GB, etc.
_temp_upload_directory_info: Temporary directory for file uploads during processing
_request_size_limit_info: Maximum request body size (lowercase units: mb, gb, kb)
_enable_api_restrictions_info: Block external API calls. true = secure (web interface only), false = open API
